snippet: Political organizations, with the help of social media, are connecting voters to their online profiles.
abstract: The Upshot; political organizations, with the help of social media, are connecting voters to their online profiles; at least two statewide campaigns have used tool Custom Managed Audiences to reach Facebook users who are registered voters or political supporters; ability to make these connection will become more important as campaigns seek ways to reach and influence voters where they increasingly spend time--on mobile devices connected to the Internet; online advertising also costs much less than other forms.
lead_paragraph: Political organizations, with the help of social media, are connecting voters to their online profiles.

headline.main: On Facebook, Nobody Knows You’re a Voter. Well, Almost Nobody.
headline.print_headline: Campaigns Use Facebook Tool to Deliver Targeted Political Ads
